name: Meklord Convert
text:
Once per turn, one of the following effects can be used. Each effect can only be used once per Duel.
● Reveal "Meklord Astro Mekanikle" in your hand, return 2 "Meklord" monsters on your field to your hand, and send 1 "Meklord Deflection" to your Graveyard from the outside of your Deck.
● Return 2 "Meklord" monsters from your Graveyard to your Deck. Then, you can add 1 Meklord Astro Mekanikle to your hand from your Deck. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck that contains 12 or more monsters and no monsters other than "Meklord" monsters. (Extra Deck does not count.)
